ultimate.name: I Am That Guy
ultimate.description: Instantly kill a target within range that has less than _percentage health.

abilities.name: Walk
abilities.description: Move up to _moveSpeed tiles. Cannot pass through enemies or obstacles.

abilities.name: Auto Shotgun
abilities.description: Deal _damage damage to a target within range. Finishing

abilities.name: Grenade
abilities.description: Throw a grenade to a tile within range. At the start of your next turn, it explodes, dealing _damage damage to all adjacent tiles.

abilities.name: Suppressing Fire
abilities.description: All enemies within a _range tile cone lose _loseTurnMeter Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Rapid Fire
abilities.description: Deal _damage damage twice to a target within range. Finishing
